backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user profiles, access control, posts, comments, and suspension checks with storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing recent frontend reliability features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of many frontend files describing their roles in UI, hooks, validation, notifications, and poll logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining light/dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with metadata, icons, and manifest links.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, colors, and startup configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication flow, bootstrap watchdog, error handling, navigation, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: UI component showing a friendly error screen with retry and logout options and optional technical details.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Displays the login screen with branding and a button that triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/feed/CommentsThr: Renders a post’s comments, handles adding, liking, and deleting comments, and enforces suspension and content rules.
frontend/src/components/feed/DeleteComme: Shows a confirmation dialog for deleting a comment and triggers the delete mutation.
frontend/src/components/feed/DeletePostD: Provides a confirmation dialog for deleting a post and executes the delete action.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Displays a post with content, image, actions, menus for reporting or deleting, and expandable comments.
Wraps app pages with header, share and notification controls, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/nav/BottomNav.ts: Fixed bottom navigation bar for switching between main app pages.
frontend/src/components/polls/WeeklyPoll: Shows the weekly poll, handles voting, and displays results or state-based messages.
frontend/src/components/profile/Username: Modal for choosing and validating a unique username, submitting it via mutation, and showing errors.
frontend/src/components/reporting/Report: Dialog for reporting a user account, triggering a report mutation and showing success or error toasts.
Dialog to report a post, sending the report, adding a local notification, and showing result toasts.
frontend/src/constants/uploads.ts: Defines allowed image MIME types and a 5MB upload size limit.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook to create and manage a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidate dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching profiles, posts, and performing mutations like setting usernames or reporting.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuspensionStatus.t: Hook that checks if the current user is suspended based on their profile data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus mobile-friendly utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
List of banned terms with utilities for normalizing text and detecting disallowed content.
frontend/src/moderation/validateTextCont: Validates text content for emptiness and disallowed terms, returning an error if invalid.
frontend/src/moderation/validateUsername: Validates a username by checking length, allowed characters, and disallowed terms.
frontend/src/notifications/localNotifica: Manages notifications in localStorage, allowing retrieval, creation, marking as read, and counting unread items.
frontend/src/notifications/notificationT: Defines notification types and the shape of a notification object.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: UI page for creating posts with content validation, image upload, suspension checks, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the main feed with posts, a poll panel, and refresh support.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows local notifications with icons and marking-as-read functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PollsPage.tsx: Displays the weekly poll panel in a standalone page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile details, suspension status, sharing options, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/polls/extractWeeklyTopics.t: Extracts top weekly topics from post and comment text using normalization, stop-word filtering, and frequency ranking.
frontend/src/polls/localPollStore.ts: Stores and manages weekly polls in localStorage, including creation, retrieval, and voting logic.
frontend/src/polls/pollTimeWindow.ts: Provides time-window utilities determining poll availability, voting periods, and weekly identifiers.
frontend/src/polls/useWeeklyPoll.ts: React hook that manages weekly poll state, creation from posts, voting, and result visibility.
frontend/src/utils/imageFileValidation.t: Validates uploaded images by checking allowed MIME types and maximum file size.
frontend/src/utils/shareHornetHive.ts: Implements sharing via Web Share API with clipboard and legacy fallbacks, plus helpers for copy operations.
frontend/src/utils/timeFormat.ts: Formats backend timestamps into relative time strings and readable suspension end dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing values from URL or storage.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if it takes too long.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing Hornet Hive’s requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features.
